backend/main.mo: Defines a canister that stores contact messages, allows submitting them with validation, and exposes a query to retrieve all messages.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping feature IDs to affected frontend files, components, tests, and confidence ratings.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing roles of numerous frontend files, including scene, UI, hooks, and interaction modules.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT_CHECKLIST.md: Deployment checklist outlining steps and diagnostics for backend and frontend deployment flow.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS styles defining light/dark theme variables and base styling for the app.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML entry file that loads the React application via main.tsx.
frontend/public/elementor/README-element: Instructions for embedding the static 3D cafe experience into WordPress via Elementor, including installation and backend notes.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app wiring together the 3D scene, overlays, startup watchdog, diagnostics, navigation, and error handling.
frontend/src/components/layout/ContourFr: Reusable framed container with contour texture background and visual styling for panels.
frontend/src/components/layout/PanelSurf: Panel layout component providing a framed surface with header, close button, and scrollable content area.
frontend/src/components/nav/HelpButton.t: Floating help button with tooltip that triggers the onboarding/controls overlay.
frontend/src/components/nav/TopNav.tsx: Top navigation bar with logo and buttons to open menu, about, contact, and export panels.
frontend/src/components/overlays/Onboard: Renders a modal onboarding overlay explaining 3D navigation, interactions, and tips, with a button to close and start exploring.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user’s identity and invalidates related queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useFirstVisitFlag.ts: Tracks whether the user is visiting for the first time using localStorage and exposes functions to dismiss onboarding.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides context and hooks for Internet Identity authentication, managing identity loading, login, logout, and status.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and submitting contact messages through the backend actor with validation and diagnostics.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets global Tailwind styles, custom color variables, typography, and reduced-motion rules for the app.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClientProvider, InternetIdentityProvider, and global styles.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPanel.tsx: Displays an informational side panel describing the cafe’s mission, values, and location details.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPanel.tsx: Provides a contact form panel that submits messages and lists alternative contact methods using React Query and UI components.
frontend/src/pages/ExportPanel.tsx: UI panel that provides a WordPress download link, warnings, and installation instructions for embedding the static 3D cafe experience.
frontend/src/pages/MenuPanel.tsx: Side panel showing a tabbed cafe menu with categorized items and prices using UI tabs and custom MenuItem components.
frontend/src/scene/CafeScene.tsx: Main 3D scene setup combining fallback geometry, environment loading, physics, and interactions with error handling.
frontend/src/scene/controls/useCafeNavig: Custom hook enabling first-person camera movement with keyboard, pointer lock, and drag-to-look controls.
frontend/src/scene/environment/BasicCafe: Simple always-available fallback room geometry providing basic walls and floor without async dependencies.
frontend/src/scene/environment/CafeEnvir: Full cafe environment with physics floor, textured surfaces, furniture, and decorative props loaded into the main scene.
frontend/src/scene/environment/CafeFurni: Defines reusable 3D furniture components including a counter, cafe table, wooden chair, and bar stool using Three.js meshes and textures.
frontend/src/scene/environment/CafeScene: Adds decorative cafe scene elements such as an espresso machine, grinder, pastry case, cup stack, and wall menu with loaded textures.
frontend/src/scene/hooks/useNonBlockingT: React hook that loads a texture asynchronously with error handling and returns undefined on failure.
frontend/src/scene/hooks/useSceneStartup: Provides a watchdog timer that triggers a callback if a scene fails to render within a timeout, with a cancel method.
frontend/src/scene/interactions/DoorCont: Controls an automatic door that opens when the camera approaches and smoothly animates its rotation.
frontend/src/scene/interactions/Inspecta: Interactive prop allowing click-and-drag rotation with visual feedback and an on-screen hint.
frontend/src/scene/interactions/Interact: Aggregates all scene interaction components including POIs, proximity zones, door control, inspectable items, and panel triggers.
frontend/src/scene/interactions/PanelPro: Displays an interactive floating prop (card, cup, or sign) with hover, press animation, and a label.
frontend/src/scene/interactions/POIMarke: Renders rotating POI markers that react to hover and dwell, triggering UI panels when looked at.
frontend/src/scene/interactions/poiRegis: Defines a list of points of interest with positions, labels, actions, and highlight colors for in‑scene interactions.
frontend/src/scene/interactions/Proximit: Detects when the camera enters defined zones and shows a UI prompt to trigger related actions.
frontend/src/scene/interactions/ScenePan: Renders clickable 3D props (menu, about, contact) that trigger onActivate with a selected panel type.
frontend/src/scene/materials/contourStyl: Provides factory functions for Three.js materials (contour, wood, metal) and a shared color palette.
frontend/src/scene/SceneErrorBoundary.ts: React error boundary that catches scene render errors and exposes callbacks for reporting and reset.
Displays an error overlay for scene load failures with optional diagnostic details and a retry action.
frontend/src/scene/ui/SceneLoadingOverla: Shows a loading overlay with a spinner and status text while the 3D scene initializes.
frontend/src/scene/utils/sceneDiagnostic: Implements scene diagnostic logging, error classification, and utilities for formatting failure stages.
frontend/src/scene/utils/webglSupport.ts: Checks browser WebGL support and required extensions, returning a success flag and failure reason.
frontend/src/state/uiOverlayStore.ts: Zustand store managing which UI panel (menu, about, contact, export) is currently active.
frontend/src/theme/motion.ts: Defines motion easing, durations, spring presets, and a helper to generate CSS transitions.
frontend/src/theme/tokens.ts: Exports design tokens for colors, typography, spacing, and radii used across the app.
frontend/src/utils/deploymentDiagnostics: Provides standardized deployment error logging, remediation hints, diagnostic wrappers, and error-type checks.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending colors, fonts, animations, and plugins for the project.
project_state.json: Tracks project state, features, issues, and architectural notes for the interactive 3D café build.
